description: Schema for FreshAir Release Note Files

condition.description: A locally evaluated expression that is used to filter items.

feature.description: A user facing feature that the release enables

key.description: The key that identifies this feature. This key will be used to lookup an image, a localized title string, and a localized description string

condition.description: A condition that must be true for the feature to function

release.description: An externally published version of the application

version.description: The version for this release. This is the value of CFBundleShortVersionString on iOS, and <Android>

features.description: A list of user facing features that have been added to the release

condition.description: A condition that must be true for the release to be valid

action.description: An action that can be performed

key.description: The key that identifies this action. This key will be used to lookup a localized title for a button

condition.description: A condition that must be true for the action to appear to the user

URL.description: The URL to open in the app when the button is pressed

actions.description: A list of actions to be displayed to the user
